relation: we have some, but I'm not part of them
they have many clubs and activities
what i do for fun, is i go to the gym play soccer, water polo, hang out with friends, or go for a swim.
really good and you could choose from many kinds of foods
we don't have dorm, hope in the future we do
have fun and don't be shy. also remember to study!

NEIU, is a University where everyone is friendly and helpful. the teachers are always disposable when you need them and will help you with everything you need. nevertheless, it a safe and clean environment for you to study there.
pageTitle: Northeastern Illinois University (NEIU) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {111558=The campus has a very safe feel about it. Once, I was leaving the library at about 8 o'clock at night after a serious study session and I expected to be freaked out when going outside after dark, but the campus felt really safe. The lights made everything brighter and feel ok. We also have these pillars scattered around the campus that have a button in the middle. If there's ever an emergency, you would press the button and help would arrive soon., 124174=i go on the November 1 and 2nd when they have the dia de os muertos event atte school., 254461=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 221040=Activity hour (when most clubs/activities/Greek life meet) is on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 3:05 - 4:05 pm.}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Antonio from Skokie, IL 02/24/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 63 Categories Comments Bang for the buck NEIU has a reputation for providing affordable education for many years now. The school is one of the cheapest forms of higher education in the Chicago land area. Recently it was ranked amongst the highest schools with the less amount of graduates leaving without debt. Am enjoying being here Student life at NEIU is complicated as the school is a commuter school. Needless to say many friendly people attended this university and there’s always something to get involved in. Am learning a lot Northeastern Illinois University is filled with delightful professors that go beyond the basic expectations in helping student’s succeed in their classes. All of my professors have flexible offer hours, and tutors are available free
